ack.p: The Taiwan Severe Influenza Research Consortium (TSIRC) study included the following investigators (all in Taiwan). Taipei: National Taiwan University Hospital–HCW, SCK, JYC and YCC. Taipei Veterans General Hospital–K-YY, W-CC and JYF. Tri-Service General Hospital–WCP and CKP. Taoyuan: Chang Gung Memorial Hospital–KCK, LCC, HCH and KWC. Taichung: Taichung Veterans General Hospital–CLW, MCC, WCC, CHT, YHH and ZRZ. China Medical University Hospital–SJL and WCC. Kaohsiung: Kaohsiung Medical University Hospital–CCS, JRT, MJT and WAC. Kaohsiung Chang Gung Memorial Hospital–WFF, YMC, CYL and HCK. Hualien: Hualien Tzu Chi Hospital–YTC.
